content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --TPTREF
      operator: empty
    - name: --RFTDTC
      operator: exists
    - name: --RFTDTC
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000248
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error when --TPTREF = null and --RFTDTC is populated
Outcome:
  Message: --RFTDTC is populated when --TPTREF is null
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0026
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The actual date or date and time of a time point that
                  acts as a fixed reference for a series of planned time points, represented
                  in a standardized character format. The fixed reference point is
                  in --TPTREF
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --RFTDTC
                Section: Timing
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.3'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0026
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Date/time for a fixed reference time point defined
                  by --TPTREF
                Document: Model v1.7
                Item: --RFTDTC
                Section: 2.2.5
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.2'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0026
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Date/time for a fixed reference time point defined
                  by --TPTREF in ISO 8601 character format.
                Document: Model v1.4
                Item: Table 2.2.5, --RFTDTC
                Section: 2.2.5
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error when --TPTREF = null and --RFTDTC is populated

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The actual date or date and time of a time point that acts as a fixed reference for a series of planned time points, represented in a standardized character format. The fixed reference point is in --TPTREF
Date/time for a fixed reference time point defined by --TPTREF
Date/time for a fixed reference time point defined by --TPTREF in ISO 8601 character format.
